alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 6:10PM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...PREVIOUS WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with localized areas up to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
